data.subject: Love Goes On
data.lyric:
If then was now
 And I had you back somehow
 I would hold you more
 I should have told you more
 If

data.subject: Heartbeat Song
data.lyric:
This is my heartbeat song and I'm gonna play it
 Been so long I forgot how to turn it up, up, up, up

data.subject: Piece By Piece (Idol Ver.)
data.lyric:
And all I remember is your back
 Walking towards the airport, leaving us all in your past
 I travell
